text_block_list.text: The day of the 'Kikuka Sho'. The paddock was enveloped in a buzz.
Rice Shower, who had changed dramatically after a summer.
Mihono Bourbon, whispered to be anxious about the distance... but still expected to be the favorite.
And Matikanetannhauser, not getting much attention, but full of motivation.
The battle to decide the strongest Umamusume, the 'Kikuka Sho', begins now...!
